--- title: "Gallery" listing: - id: sketchnotes contents: - "gallery/sketchnotes/" type: grid image-height: 350px grid-columns: 2 fields: [image, title, based-on] field-display-names: based-on: "from:" categories: true grid-item-align: center sort: date asc - id: templates contents: - "gallery/templates/" type: default image-align: left image-height: 200px image-placeholder: "templates/placeholder.png" fields: [image, title, description] sort: date-modified desc page-layout: full #title-block-banner: true --- **Visual Thinking / Conceptual Illustration / Information Design** by yours truly. ## Sketchnotes Visual notes which summarise lectures, talks, podcast episodes, youtube videos, books, and more. :::{.callout} ## Attribution

Unless otherwise stated all illustrations on this website are by Cynthia Huang (@cynthiahqy) and are licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0. This means you are free to reuse the work as long as you provide attribution (@cynthiahqy), and use the same licence for any derivative works.

::: :::{#sketchnotes} ::: ## Design Notes and Templates Notes to self on sketching, Inkscape, Quarto, SVG, CSS/HTML, web accessibility.^[Disclaimer: the primary audience for these notes is myself, and I make no guarantees about accuracy or quality of the content inside.] :::{#templates} ::: ::: {.cell} :::
